availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph John Durham (Green County, Kentucky, saddler and farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, saddler and farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth Henry Durham in Green County, Kentucky, on May 27, 1845. Father of Lucien Durham, Ella Durham, Henry Durham, William Durham, and John Durham. Saddler in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Green County in 1860.

Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 000594644.
